column4: hey dudes, i lost an eager ubuntu conert yesterday cos the latest updates killed him gnome, he could not log in at all and since he was not happy with KDE he has now re-installed, no I'm afraid to run the last weeks updates. did anyone else have issues with gnome not logging in anfter the update, we tried rolling back packages but no relief hey
better to troubleshoot then reinstall next time-->that is why we are here :)
i know i tried but he had work to do
